scripts.build: npm run prepare:native:strict && tsc && vite build && electron-builder
scripts.build:sidecar:win: cargo build --manifest-path native-capture-sidecar/Cargo.toml --release && powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force native-capture-sidecar/bin/win32 | Out-Null; Copy-Item native-capture-sidecar/target/release/native-capture-sidecar.exe native-capture-sidecar/bin/win32/native-capture-sidecar.exe -Force"
scripts.build:sidecar:mac: mkdir -p native-capture-sidecar/target/release native-capture-sidecar/bin/darwin .cache/swift-module-cache && xcrun swiftc native-capture-sidecar/macos/NativeCaptureSidecar.swift -O -module-cache-path .cache/swift-module-cache -framework ScreenCaptureKit -framework AVFoundation -framework CoreMedia -framework CoreVideo -framework AppKit -framework ApplicationServices -o native-capture-sidecar/target/release/native-capture-sidecar && cp native-capture-sidecar/target/release/native-capture-sidecar native-capture-sidecar/bin/darwin/native-capture-sidecar && chmod +x native-capture-sidecar/bin/darwin/native-capture-sidecar
scripts.build:mac: npm run prepare:native:strict && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:win: npm run prepare:native:strict && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run prepare:native:strict && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --linux
